abstract.para: This document explains the content of the MMC mail plugin configuration file

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The « mail » plugin allows the MMC to add/remove mail delivery management attributes to users and groups, and mail virtual domains, etc. It uses the « base » plugin for all its related LDAP operations.

Like all MMC related configuration file, its file format is INI style. The file is made of sections, each one starting with a « [sectionname] » header. In each section options can be defined like this « option = value ».

For example:
[section1] option1 = 1 option2 = 2
[section2] option1 = foo option2 = plop
